bMaximizeViewport: Whether to maximize the viewport (enter Immersive Mode) when recording
CountdownSeconds: Delay that we will use before starting recording
EngineTimeDilation: The engine time dilation to apply during the recording
bResetPlayhead: Reset playhead to beginning of the playback range when starting recording
bStopAtPlaybackEnd: Automatically stop recording when reaching the end of the playback range
bRemoveRedundantTracks: Recommended for use with recorded spawnables. Beware that changes to actor instances in the map after recording may alter the recording when played back
ReduceKeysTolerance: Tolerance to use when reducing keys
bSaveRecordedAssets: Whether to save recorded level sequences and assets when done recording
bAutoLock: Whether to lock the level sequence when done recording
bAutoSerialize: Whether to incrementally serialize and store some data while recording
